Thank you, Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> jeffsheftic@yahoo.com [mailto:jeffsheftic@yahoo.com] Sent: Tuesday, May 15, 2012 7:05 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners Hello and good morning Sara. I met with the potential client yesterday. We are awaiting feedback. Thanks, Jeff
Sent from my Verizon Wireless Droid
-----Original message-----From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: Jeff Sheftic <jeffsheftic@yahoo.com>, "mike.crist@broadridge.com" <mike.crist@broadridge.com <mailto:jeffsheftic@yahoo.com>> Sent: Mon, May 14, 2012 21:31:00 GMT+00:00 Subject: RE: MBO Partners Hi Mike, Hope you had nice weekend, I just wanted to follow up on my email bellow. I have attached the contract we have with Broadridge and if you follow the link below you will be directed towards our SOW: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf> Please let me know if you have any questions or if you need any additional information from MBO. Once we have the SOW completed, signed, and returned via email we will be able to activate Jeffs account and get him set up to bill. Thank you, Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Thursday, May 10, 2012 12:49 PM To: 'Jeff Sheftic'; mike.crist@broadridge.com <mailto:mike.crist@broadridge.com> Subject: MBO Partners Hi Mike, So nice to meet you via email, attached is the MSA that we have in place with Broadridge. All we would need to bring on Jeff is for Boradridge to complete and sign the attached SOW so we have the specific details of this engagement. Pelase let me know if you have any additional questions. On behalf of all of MBO we look forward to working with your firm again. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: Jeff Sheftic [mailto:jeffsheftic@yahoo.com] <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Sent: Thursday, May 10, 2012 8:33 AM To: Sara Conde; mike.crist@broadridge.com <mailto:mike.crist@broadridge.com> Subject: Good morning Sara.
